Reviews.Content: hi,Thnak you , i am very happy for pay from you.the mobile ( Iphone 3g 8Gb ) is very good stat .Thank'si will pay from you Again .Ahmed Alrefaie

Reviews.Title: Terrible!!!
Reviews.Author: Thatonegirl
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone for my father for Christmas it was awful!!!!! The camera didnt work, it was cracked and broken in multiple different places. When we brought it to the apple store they told us someone had replaced the screen, so it was no longer and apple display and they couldn't even replace the phone!!! Can not be used at all and was SUCH a waste of money. And NOW, trying to return it is impossible!Don't east your money. These @ssholes are just going to rip you off. TRUST me!

Reviews.Title: Worked great!
Reviews.Author: Elaine
Reviews.Content: The phone worked amazing! And it still is! It also came way before the time it said it wasting to arrive! Way very happy!

Reviews.Title: It sucks, it was supposed to be a 3g like mine, but it not even close!!!
Reviews.Author: BlueWindWoman "Carol"
Reviews.Content: Not enough info was given about it, only that is was a 3g  so I assumed it would be like mine, but no my mistakeThe software is so old it does'nt even have the icloud program on it, so I can't update it from the cloud with my contacts or notes or anything.  Most games wont play on it.....its just crappy.  I am so disappointed, I used my Christmas gift card to get it,  I am a single Mother on disability and I cant afford another so I just have to live with it.

Reviews.Title: run away now
Reviews.Author: marmar
Reviews.Content: this guy sold me a piece of crap. he lied about it being a description. he was very sarcastic about me returning it. he sold me iPhone with no sim card tray. and the lock button was completely unusable. unless you wanted to shove something in the lock button for it to use every time.

Reviews.Title: 3g phone
Reviews.Author: MJB
Reviews.Content: Excellent product in great condition delivered as promised easy to boot up and load thank you very much for all

Reviews.Title: iPhone 3G 8GB
Reviews.Author: TJP1069
Reviews.Content: the phone is great but it only has one problem, and that is u cant change the APN Settings. the only way to do that is to jailbreak. i didnt kno that until now. but anywho! everything else is awesome!!

Reviews.Title: Pay attention to the wording
Reviews.Author: H. Ballman
Reviews.Content: I think if the first person bought the phone, he's sorry now. Not Unlocked means locked. A locked I Phone can only be used with a contract for service with AT&T.; An unlocked I phone can be used with your own phone service and sim chip. Calling it (not Unlocked) sounds like he's trying to confuse people to sell it.

Reviews.Title: i havent order it.
Reviews.Author: Sammy
Reviews.Content: I havent ordered it yet but im trying to decided on rather to . I have a question , how am i supose to use a phone thats not unlocked. They are all reasonable prices but tell me how am i suppose to use it.
